entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
